attributes.action: Beg Johnnie to let me save two Donkeys....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please can everyone out there sign this here petition & beg Johnnie Terrett my loving fiance to please let me rescue two beautiful donkeys en France. They are desperate for a new home as their owner now has to go into a home himself & they have no where to go. We have five beautiful acres of field right outside our front door with Storm & Blue the horses for new friends. John has said a firm no to me saving these beautiful eeyore's & I'm asking for everyone's help please in changing his mind.... Even Donkey's need someone to love them ya know... Remember Shrek?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
